title: Your Team
text:
I am an analytics professional with an investments, finance, & market research background. I am also a U.S. Marine Corps Veteran. My family and I call Franklin, Tennessee home (just south of Nashville). I have 12 years of experience at a premier, global investment manager T. Rowe Price and currently work full-time for Ramsey Solutions as a data analyst in the digital marketing and real estate business analytics space.

title: Our Mission
text:
Mission One
We provide simple, aesthetic, easy-to-understand data visualizations that empower leaders to engage, influence, and grow their tribe.

title: Our Mission
text:
Mission Two
We deliver world-class investment manager research & performance measurement to financial organizations who need additional support.

title: Get Charts
text:
Get help with business intelligence and communicating with data visualization.

We provide bandwidth so you can focus on relationships.
We can help you develop visuals, business intelligence dashboards, or reporting to help you monitor your business environment.


Ready to be your go-to resource and integrate with your team.

Tell us what you’re looking for.
Onboard us with your team or securely collaborate through Google Drive, Microsoft Teams, or Github.
Work with us part-time, asynchronously.

We help business leaders, expanding teams, entrepreneurs, small business owners, marketers, copywriters, graphic designers, investment advisors, non-profit executives, public administrators, insurance professionals, researchers, influencers, etc.
Create the bandwidth you need!
 
 

Don’t waste hours teaching yourself how to deliver effective data visualizations.
Position yourself among the professionals in your sphere.
You don’t need deep pockets.


Understand your business.


Form your data story.


Influence stakeholders.


Be understood.


Build credibility.


One chart at a time.



Chart better. Lead better.

title: Chart Better. Lead Better.
text:
Data & Analytics Specialties

Partnering with clients to understand requirements and deliver great products.
Creating data visualizations that are fit-for-purpose, easy to integrate, & easy to socialize.
Building charts and tables you can actually understand.
Delivering situational awareness through Tableau/PowerBI dashboards.
Accelerating important business conversations by leveraging data more powerfully.
Scaling data visualization and reporting programmatically using R, Python, & SQL.
Organizing data and reporting using Microsoft Excel.

title: Chart Better. Lead Better.
text:
One chart at a time
In a world flooded with text, distracted readers get bored and their attention drifts toward the simple, beautiful, and intriguing. You can keep them focused on your message by including the right visuals in the right way at the right time. Whether it be a single chart or an interactive dashboard, good presentation of your data story can make or break your leadership credibility. We can help you chart the right path forward.

title: Chart Better. Lead Better.

title: Chart Better. Lead Better.
text:
Creating visuals & business intelligence.
Business is dynamic. Even when it’s stable, it can be hard to pin down. Things are always changing. It’s hard to get a handle on your own business operations and understand the competitive landscape.
How can you build a good picture of what’s going on, let alone find the time to do it?
Do you have the bandwidth you need to remain a dependable leader?
Are you maintaining the right level of influence when you communicate with clients or key stakeholders?
You can’t just send emails. Good presentation of your data story can make or break your leadership credibility. We can help you chart the right path forward by providing simple visualizations that fit your narrative. We also develop business intelligence dashboards that help you monitor your business environment.

Business is dynamic. Even when it’s stable, it can be hard to pin down. Things are always changing. It’s hard to get a handle on your own business operations and understand the competitive landscape.
How can you build a good picture of what’s going on, let alone find the time to do it?
Do you have the bandwidth you need to remain a dependable leader?

title: Chart Better. Lead Better.
section: Business intelligence for the busy leader.
text:
Business intelligence for the busy leader.
Business is dynamic. Even when it’s stable, it can be hard to pin down.
Having trouble building a good picture of what’s going on? Do you even have the time to do it?
Do you have the bandwidth you need to remain a dependable leader?
Are you maintaining the right level of influence when you communicate with clients or key stakeholders?
Good presentation of your data story can make or break your leadership credibility. Sending more emails packed with text won’t have the impact you’re looking for. We can help you chart the right path forward by providing simple visualizations that fit your narrative.

title: Brian Davidhizar, M.S., CIPM
text:

Rowe Price and currently work full-time for Ramsey Solutions as a data analyst in the digital marketing and real estate business analytics space.
